notes: Ship types wired to reusable hull classes plus default stock components. Stats represent factory/default builds; components are fully swappable.

ships.name: Firefly Scout
ships.description: Compact recon hull with long-duration life support and efficient drives, popular with freelancers.

ships.name: Swiftwind Courier
ships.description: Diplomatic and data courier frame tuned for burst acceleration and secure payload pods.

ships.name: Raptor Corvette
ships.description: Multi-role escort corvette with balanced thrust, armor, and modular hardpoints.

ships.name: Hammerfall Cruiser
ships.description: Heavy line cruiser built for endurance engagements and siege support.

ships.name: Aurora Destroyer
ships.description: Fast response ship optimized for anti-raider operations and precision strikes.

ships.name: Elysium Luxury Liner
ships.description: Orbiting palace with biospheres, theaters, and private docks for elite patrons.

ships.name: Oxen Heavy Freighter
ships.description: Slow, stubborn bulk hauler with modular cargo spines and tug docking ports.

ships.name: Titanite Mining Barge
ships.description: Mobile refinery with heavy rigs for belt and rubble-field extraction.

ships.name: Galatea Science Vessel
ships.description: Deep-survey research craft fitted with advanced labs and sensor masts.

ships.name: Solace Medical Frigate
ships.description: Hospital frigate with triage bays, quarantine rings, and mercy-drop shuttles.

ships.name: Vigil Patrol Cutter
ships.description: System authority patrol craft for customs inspections and anti-piracy sweeps.

ships.name: Ironveil Frigate
ships.description: Shield-heavy frigate that serves as the backbone of many frontier fleets.

ships.name: Starfane Carrier
ships.description: Fleet carrier with extensive fighter bays and modular command decks.

ships.name: Cerberus Battleship
ships.description: Brutal fortress hull mounting spinal cannons and layered armor belts.

ships.name: Mule Utility Tug
ships.description: Unpretty but indispensable tug for docking ops, salvage pulls, and station work.

ships.name: Farreach Explorer
ships.description: Self-sufficient survey hull built for multi-year expeditions beyond charted lanes.

ships.name: Concord Diplomatic Cruiser
ships.description: Ceremonial cruiser emphasizing security, comfort, and redundant comm suites.

ships.name: Blackfin Runner
ships.description: Illicit courier hull with baffled drives and configurable voids.

ships.name: Gallows Salvager
ships.description: Purpose-built for cutting, grappling, and stripping derelicts in hazardous zones.

ships.name: Genesis Colony Ship
ships.description: Colonization ark with biospheres, fabrication decks, and cryo vaults.

ships.name: Falcon Escort
ships.description: Versatile escort hull for convoy defense and customs shows of force.

ships.name: Warden Gunship
ships.description: Orbital support gunship for close air support, boarding cover, and intimidation.

ships.name: Recon Drone Swarm
ships.description: Pack of semi-disposable recon drones for wide-area scouting.

ships.name: Shade Stealth Corvette
ships.description: Black-ops vessel with hull-null cloaking and low-emission drives.

ships.name: Waypost Refueler
ships.description: Mobile fuel and provisions tender that shadows long-haul convoys.

ships.name: Helios Surveyor
ships.description: Agile survey craft specialized for planetary and resource scanning.

ships.name: Pilgrim Transport
ships.description: Workhorse passenger and migrant carrier across stable trade lanes.

ships.name: Keeper Defense Drone
ships.description: Compact guardian drone deployed as point defense around key assets.

ships.name: Sabre Corvette
ships.description: Fast-attack corvette built for slashing raids and pursuit.

ships.name: Vanguard Frigate
ships.description: Reliable vanguard hull favored by independent security contractors.

ships.name: Zephyr Battlecruiser
ships.description: Mobile flagship that trades some armor for speed and reach.

ships.name: Exodus Arkship
ships.description: Ancient slow-moving ark designed for epoch-spanning migration.

ships.name: Tramp Freighter Sparrow
ships.description: A ubiquitous light freighter favored by independent captains and frontier stations. Cheap to run, easy to patch, and just barely big enough to turn a profit.

ships.name: Medium Hauler Heron
ships.description: A workhorse medium hauler used by small lines and corporate subcontractors. More cargo and endurance than a tramp ship, but still small enough to slip into frontier ports.

ships.name: Militia Skiff Ward
ships.description: A light interceptor used by local militias and system guards. Cheap hull, overpowered engines, and just enough guns to make smugglers reconsider.

ships.name: System Gunboat Bulwark
ships.description: A heavy patrol gunboat used to anchor system defense lines. Slower than skiffs but carrying significantly more firepower and armor.

ships.name: Customs Cutter Scribe
ships.description: A fast-response customs cutter built around inspection bays and scanning suites. Lightly armed but well-equipped to find contraband and lean on smugglers.

ships.name: Orion Commuter Shuttle
ships.description: A short-range passenger shuttle used for station hops, surface transfers, and commuter routes. Comfortable seats, minimal cargo, and token self-defense.

ships.name: Aurora Commuter Ferry
ships.description: A dependable civilian commuter ferry used for short-haul passenger transport between stations, orbitals, and surface ports. Reliable, safe, and held together by decades of standardized parts.

ships.name: Talon Planetfall Dropship
ships.description: A compact surface-capable craft used for landing operations, rescue runs, and courier hops through atmospheres. Reinforced hull plating allows safe entry even under harsh planetary conditions.

ships.name: Overfounder Construction Rig
ships.description: A hulking construction platform equipped with fabricators, drones, and modular arms used for building stations, repairing orbitals, and expanding habitat modules. Slow but invaluable to frontier colonies.

ships.name: Skywhale Gas Harvester
ships.description: A gas giant skimmer equipped with scoop fields and atmospheric collection tanks. Designed for long-duration gas harvesting, refueling operations, and industrial extraction.

ships.name: Gritjaw Scrap Tug
ships.description: A rugged industrial tug built for salvage, debris clearing, and the retrieval of hazardous wreckage. Equipped with reinforced grapples and compact cutting arrays.

ships.name: Marauder Raider Corvette
ships.description: A dedicated raider hull built for fast strike operations against freighters and lightly defended convoys. Stripped-down comforts, oversized engines, and forward-facing guns.

ships.name: Grapnel Boarding Cutter
ships.description: A light boarding craft fitted with grapples, breaching collars, and hard-dock clamps. Built to survive closing to knife-fight range rather than win a stand-up gun duel.

ships.name: Jury-Rig Pirate Gunboat
ships.description: An improvised gunboat assembled from salvaged hulls, spare turrets, and whatever reactors the crew could coax back to life. Crude but dangerous when it catches a target flat-footed.

ships.name: Wisp Anomaly Skiff
ships.description: A nimble research skiff packed with sensor booms and field labs, designed to skirt the edges of anomalies and bring back usable data before everything melts.

ships.name: Delve Xenoarchaeology Tender
ships.description: A specialized tender carrying dig crews, survey drones, and secure vaults for relics. Built to operate in contested ruins with enough autonomy to run long-duration digs.

ships.name: Longwatch Sensor Array Ship
ships.description: A deep-space sensor platform built around a massive phased array and signal-processing spine. It lingers at the edge of systems, listening to everything and hoping nothing shoots back.
